bug.author: nsubiron
bug.summary: Bikes raise PhysX error when running in debug
bug.description:
The following is printed to the console every tick when a bike/motorbike is spawned <denchmark-code>[2019.01.27-11.14.15:989][978]LogPhysics: Error: PHYSX: (D:/Build/++UE4/Sync/Engine/Source /ThirdParty/PhysX3/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/src/PxVehicleUpdate.cpp 4833) eINVALID_PARAMETER : PxVehicle4W does not obey the rule that the eFRONT_RIGHT/eREAR_RIGHT wheels are to the right of the eFRONT_LEFT/eREAR_LEFT wheels </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h4>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Package the project in Debug config (Change -clientconfig=Debug in Package.sh) Run the simulator Spawn a bike
